Package oh_hecc.game_parts.passage

Interface ModelBitsPassageInterface

All Known Subinterfaces:
PassageEditingInterface, PassageModelEditablePassageInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
EditablePassage
public interface ModelBitsPassageInterface
An interface for the EditablePassage, used by the PassageObject in src/oh_hecc/mvc/model_bits.

    • isThisAPointOfNoReturn

      boolean isThisAPointOfNoReturn()
      Is this passage a 'point of no return'? (it's a point of no return if it has a 'noreturn' tag)
      Returns:
      true if yes, false if not.
